title: Albertsons Posts Higher Sales, Lifts Guidance, Dividend Despite Supply-Chain Costs
sub_head: Company raises its quarterly dividend by 20% to 12 cents a share
body:
Albertsons Cos. posted higher sales and raised its guidance for the full year on what it sees as a favorable consumer backdrop, despite logging steeper supply-chain costs for the fiscal second quarter.
The supermarket company, based in Boise, Idaho, posted net sales and other revenue for the three months ended Sept. 11 of $16.51 billion, up 4.7% from the same period last year. That exceeded the $15.86 billion analysts polled by FactSet had expected.
